verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* being \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w access|strong="G4318"\w* by \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* we \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \add so\add*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* we \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tribulations|strong="G2347"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*;
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w experience|strong="G1382"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w experience|strong="G1382"\w*, \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w maketh|strong="G2617"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G2617"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is shed \w abroad|strong="G1632"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* which is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G5607"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* without \w strength|strong="G0772"\w*, in \w due|strong="G2596"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* the \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w scarcely|strong="G3433"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* a righteous \w man|strong="G1342"\w* \w will|strong="G0599"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*: \w yet|strong="G1063"\w* \w peradventure|strong="G5029"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* a good \w man|strong="G0018"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w would|strong="G5111"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w dare|strong="G5111"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w commendeth|strong="G4921"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, in \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w while|strong="G5607"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w Much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w being|strong="G1344"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, we shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w*, when we \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w*, we were \w reconciled|strong="G2644"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w death|strong="G2288"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w*, being \w reconciled|strong="G2644"\w*, we shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \add so\add*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G2744"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2983"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w atonement|strong="G2643"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1223"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* have \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w is|strong="G1677"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w imputed|strong="G1677"\w* when there \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="G0235"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w reigned|strong="G0936"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Adam|strong="G0076"\w* \w to|strong="G3360"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* them that \w had|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* \w after|strong="G1909"\w* the \w similitude|strong="G3667"\w* \w of|strong="G3847"\w* \w Adam’s|strong="G0076"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w figure|strong="G5179"\w* of him that was to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w offence|strong="G3900"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add is\add* the free \w gift|strong="G5486"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* through the \w offence|strong="G3900"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* be \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*, \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \add which is\add* by \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, hath \w abounded|strong="G4052"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add it was\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* that \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*, \add so is\add* the \w gift|strong="G1434"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \add was\add* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2631"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the free \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* \add is\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w offences|strong="G3900"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w justification|strong="G1345"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w by|strong="G3900"\w* one \w man’s|strong="G1520"\w* \w offence|strong="G3900"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w reigned|strong="G0936"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*; \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* they which \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w abundance|strong="G4050"\w* of \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.)

\w Therefore|strong="G0686"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w offence|strong="G3900"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \add judgment came\add* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2631"\w*; \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1345"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \add the free gift came\add* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w justification|strong="G1347"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w disobedience|strong="G3876"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* were \w made|strong="G2525"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w shall|strong="G2525"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* be \w made|strong="G2525"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w entered|strong="G3922"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w offence|strong="G3900"\w* might \w abound|strong="G4121"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w abounded|strong="G4121"\w*, \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* did much more \w abound|strong="G5248"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* hath \w reigned|strong="G0936"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w might|strong="G0936"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
